name: Negative Snake
description: Press, tap, or click on a tile to build or break a wall! Your snake will grow when it eats apples, but the only way to control it is to prevent it from suicide! It will move when touching a wall, but be warned; If trapped, suffocation will occur. This game was made under three hours on iOS. Yeah! I made the game on iOS. Pure HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript. Hope you enjoy this interesting mobile friendly twist on a classic game.
